main

Class GameSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameSetup

  • public class GameSetup
extends java.lang.Object
    GameSetup handles setup of the game. It instantiates members within game environment so its ready for the main game play loop. It makes use of GameWorldGenerator. After it's done it calls finishedSetup in GameEnvironment.
